channel.title: ~ LOSTPKZ ~ -~- The rebirth. v7. 317
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/travis_018/serversignaturephp-1.jpg[/img][/center] [center]~ LOSTPKZ ~
-~- The rebirth. v7.[/center]
[center]After a two year gap, the staff & developers of LostPkz have decided to join together once again and give it another shot, creating LostPkz v7. Same old source, same old revision, same old Lostpkz but revamped though, this time better than ever.
We're pleased to present to you one of the best old school pking servers...[/center]
[center] ~_~_~~_~_~~_~_~~_~_~
To visit the forums click: http://bit.ly/K4WtdM To download the client click: http://bit.ly/MfxyoH to visit webclient click: We are working on it right now ~_~_~~_~_~~_~_~~_~_~[/center]
[center] [center] Perfect revamped skills Flawless combat PvP system Stable economy Almost perfect animations / stances Loads of new content for players to enjoy 24/7 up time - great dedicated server FULL slayer tower Item bonus's perfected. 'welfare ags' < risk COMPLETE old school pking (Pre 2008) No overpowered custom items, or donation items. Great pking community. Great staff and development team with years of experience on LostPkz. - Fully working normal prayers. - Fully working Ancient Prayers, including leeches, curses, SoulSplit and Turmoil! - Correct GodWars! - Bosses! Such as; Corporeal, Tormented Demons, StrykeWorms, Frost Dragons and Barrelchest boss! - Working Specials! - No overpowered weapons - Donator Get Some Extra Benefits - Friendly staff - Working slayer and slayer tasks! - Gain EP points from slayer, pking and killing bosses! - Perfect PKing! - Perfect Switching - Fully working barrage - Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Primal all with correct bonuses! - Working spirit shields with bonuses and protections! - All skills trainable! - Summoning with working familiars! - All SkillCape emotes work! - Working Overloads and Extremes![/center] [/center] [center][IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/travis_018/godswordslostpkz.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/travis_018/lostpkzpking.jpg[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/travis_018/lostpkzpestcontrol-1.png[/img][/center] Look at our videos on youtube lets bring that back !http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gvfsIgIAaQ

Are you the original owner? The only reason I ask is that it seems you are trying to bring back a server and I feel it would be wrong if you are not the original owner.

item.title: ~ LOSTPKZ ~ -~- The rebirth. v7. 317
item.dc:creator: @Mark321 Mark321
item.description:
@Mark321 wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]~ LOSTPKZ ~

-~- The rebirth. v7.[/center]

[center]After a two year gap, the staff & developers of LostPkz have decided to join together once again and give it another shot, creating LostPkz v7.
Same old source, same old revision, same old Lostpkz but revamped though, this time better than ever.

We’re pleased to present to you one of the best old school pking servers…[/center]

[center]
~~~~~~~~

To visit the forums click: http://bit.ly/K4WtdM
To download the client click: http://bit.ly/MfxyoH
to visit webclient click: We are working on it right now
~~~~~~~~[/center]

[center]
[center]
Perfect revamped skills
Flawless combat PvP system
Stable economy
Almost perfect animations / stances
Loads of new content for players to enjoy
24/7 up time - great dedicated server
FULL slayer tower
Item bonus’s perfected. ‘welfare ags’ < risk
COMPLETE old school pking (Pre 2008)
No overpowered custom items, or donation items.
Great pking community.
Great staff and development team with years of experience on LostPkz.

  • Fully working normal prayers.
  • Fully working Ancient Prayers, including leeches, curses, SoulSplit and Turmoil!
  • Correct GodWars!
  • Bosses! Such as; Corporeal, Tormented Demons, StrykeWorms, Frost Dragons and Barrelchest boss!
  • Working Specials!
  • No overpowered weapons
  • Donator Get Some Extra Benefits
  • Friendly staff
  • Working slayer and slayer tasks!
  • Gain EP points from slayer, pking and killing bosses!
  • Perfect PKing!
  • Perfect Switching
  • Fully working barrage
  • Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Primal all with correct bonuses!
  • Working spirit shields with bonuses and protections!
  • All skills trainable!
  • Summoning with working familiars!
  • All SkillCape emotes work!
  • Working Overloads and Extremes![/center]
    [/center]
    [center][/center]
    [center][/center]
    [center][/center]
    Look at our videos on youtube lets bring that back !http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gvfsIgIAaQ
